snippet: The Juilliard School’s Focus! 2013 ended its exploration of postwar British compositions with renditions of works like “Ceres” and “Ritual Dances.”
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by Juilliard Orchestra as part of week-long series Focus! 2013 at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Juilliard School’s Focus! 2013 ended its exploration of postwar British compositions with renditions of works like “Ceres” and “Ritual Dances.”

headline.main: An Asteroid, So to Speak, Lands Onstage
headline.print_headline: An Asteroid, So to Speak, Lands Onstage
